Users online.¶

List of users online¶

class online.views.UserOnlineListView(**kwargs)¶

List of users online.

url: online/list

Output:

{
 "users_ids": [
     24,
     25
 ],
 "users": {
     "24": {
         "id": 24,
         "url": "http://localhost:8085/profiles/24/",
         "account": 0,
         "username": "woman4",
         "email": "woman4@gmail.com",
         "groups": [],
         "is_superuser": false,
         "is_edit": false,

         "is_online": true
     },
     "25": {
         "id": 25,
         "url": "http://localhost:8085/profiles/25/",
         "account": 0,
         "username": "woman5",
         "email": "woman5@gmail.com",
         "groups": [],
         "is_superuser": false,
         "is_edit": false,
         "main_photo": "http://localhost:8085/media/user_photo/25_YCAHUqA.jpeg.100x100_q95_box-115%2C0%2C805%2C690_crop-smart_upscale.jpg",
         "is_online": true
     }
 },
 "users_list": [
     {
         "id": 24,

     },

Update socket id¶

class online.views.UpdateSocketIdView(**kwargs)¶

Updating socket id by token.

After F5.

After login.

Add a new record in UserOnline model.

Remove an old one by agent and token.

UserOnline.objects.get(token=token,agent=agent)

Output:

{'status': 1, 'message': 'not authenticated'}

or

{'status': 0, 'message': 'OK'}

dating
